description:
A bug with the new model suits became apparent when searching for the juden target causing injury onto Plug`s arms. Aresta takes time off of work to make sure she`s okay.  With Plug hospitalized and to keep her from boredom, Aresta dresses up in a maid outfit to distract her. However one things leads to another....
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: めいど・いん・アレスタ!
